I suggest that all governors of a border states enact the policy of welcoming illegal aliens with open arms, leasing busses and giving them a free ride to Washington DC and a free Taxi Cab drive to any Senator or Rep who refuses to address the problem. That would be about 20-40 dollars per illegal as opposed to the millions the states are incurring now. 
 It would also get these politicians off dead center.
